rationale: The species is known from the coastal rivers of central Viet Nam from the An Lao River   (Binh Dinh Province) to the Phong Nha River (Quang Binh Province). General threats in the region include decline of its aquatic habitat due to pollution, but this is not thought to be affecting the entire range of the species. It has a wide range and is unlikely to be threatened at present. Therefore it is assessed as Least Concern.
